text: Kalamorukkam is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by VS Indran, starring Ashokan and Jalaja in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Ashokan as Babu * Jalaja as Chandrika * Captain Raju as Prasad, Damodharan Nair (double role) * Karamana Janardanan Nair as Shekharan Thampi *KPAC Sunny as Raghava Kurup *Mala Aravindan as Rappai *Jagannathan as Panikker *Unnimary as Bird *Rajakumari Venu as Lakshmi *Vanithasree as Ashwathi * Aryad Gopalakrishnan as Madhavan * Meena Krishnan as Thankamma * Pradeep Sakthi as Gabri ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Kalamorukkam
